title: #17: False Flags & Conspiracy Theories
description:
The world is a rigged game and the conspiracy theorists are simply trying to sort out all of the lies in order to better understand how the world really works...but this comes with a heavy price.

The dumbed-down general public just can’t wrap their little heads around the idea of a country attacking themselves in order to kick off a war that they secretly wanted all along, so they direct their ridicule at those of us that can see through the lies. False flag attacks have been around for a very long time, and this episode uncovers some of the signs that an event might not be as organic as it is being portrayed to be.
